description: Japanese spikenard, also known as Aralia cordata, is an incredible and ornamental species of plant with many amazing qualities. It has bright white and yellow "umbels" of flowers that serve as a great source of bee and butterfly food. It is also has a deep and pleasant root aroma, making it an excellent addition to your herb garden. The root has been used for centuries for medicinal purposes such as treating skin inflammation, digestive issues, and lung diseases. This plant is low-maintenance, with no particular soil requirement, and can even tolerate brief periods of inundation. Japanese spikenard is a great choice for anyone looking for a diverse and beautiful addition to their outdoor space.
